statements: SELECT * FROM DriverInformation;
SELECT driver_id, first_name, last_name FROM DriverInformation;
SELECT license_number, first_name, last_name FROM DriverInformation WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DriverInformation ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, license_number, driving_history FROM DriverInformation WHERE driving_history LIKE '%accident%';
SELECT * FROM DriverInformation WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM DriverInformation WHERE license_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT driver_id, first_name FROM DriverInformation WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverInformation WHERE driving_history LIKE '%accident%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM DriverInformation;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurance_id, driver_id, premium_amount FROM insurance_premiums WHERE coverage_details->>'accident_coverage' = 'comprehensive';
SELECT driver_id, personal_details->>'name' AS driver_name FROM drivers WHERE license_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE license_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT drivers.driver_id, insurance_premiums.premium_amount FROM drivers INNER JOIN insurance_premiums ON drivers.driver_id = insurance_premiums.driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS insurance_count FROM insurance_premiums GROUP BY driver_id HAVING insurance_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM driver_info;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE driver_license_number = 12345;
SELECT policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT license_number, personal_details FROM driver_info ORDER BY license_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_info WHERE license_number = 12345;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT driver_info.personal_details, vehicle_info.make, vehicle_info.model FROM driver_info JOIN vehicle_info ON driver_info.license_number = vehicle_info.driver_license_number;
SELECT COUNT(policy_id) AS total_policies, AVG(premium_amount) AS average_premium FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 5000 AND policy_type = 'Comprehensive';
SELECT * FROM DriverPersonalDetails;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM DriverPersonalDetails ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT license_number, driver_id FROM LicenseInformation WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT history_id, driver_id, violation_date, violation_description FROM DrivingHistory WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, premium_amount FROM InsurancePremiums WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM DriverPersonalDetails WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LicenseInformation WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, violation_description FROM DriverPersonalDetails JOIN DrivingHistory ON DriverPersonalDetails.driver_id = DrivingHistory.driver_id;
SELECT MAX(premium_amount) AS highest_premium FROM InsurancePremiums;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM DrivingHistory GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverInformation;
SELECT driver_id, license_number FROM DriverInformation WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleInformation WHERE vehicle_year > 2010;
SELECT driver_id, accident_date, accident_details FROM AccidentHistory ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM DriverInformation;
SELECT driver_id, license_number, personal_details FROM DriverInformation ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT vi.*, di.driver_id, di.license_number FROM VehicleInformation vi JOIN DriverInformation di ON vi.driver_id = di.driver_id WHERE vi.vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT di.*, ah.accident_date, ah.accident_details FROM DriverInformation di LEFT JOIN AccidentHistory ah ON di.driver_id = ah.driver_id WHERE ah.accident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ip.policy_id, ip.policy_type, pr.base_rate FROM InsurancePolicy ip JOIN PremiumRates pr ON ip.policy_type = pr.policy_type WHERE pr.age_range = '18-25';
